verses.verse: For it is <S%G4053>superfluous<s%> for me to <S%G1125>write<s%> to you <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G1248>ministry<s%> to the <S%G40>saints;<s%>

for I <S%G3609>know<s%> your <S%G4288>readiness,<s%> of <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2744>boast<s%> <S%G5228>about<s%> you to the <S%G3110>Macedonians,<s%> [namely,] that <S%G882>Achaia<s%> has been <S%G3903>prepared<s%> <S%G575>since<s%> <S%G4070>last<s%> <S%G4070>year,<s%> and your <S%G2205>zeal<s%> has <S%G2042>stirred<s%> up <S%G4183>most<s%> of them.

But I have <S%G3992>sent<s%> the <S%G80>brethren,<s%> that our <S%G2745>boasting<s%> <S%G5228>about<s%> you may not be <S%G2758>made<s%> <S%G2758>empty<s%> in <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3313>case,<s%> that, as I was <S%G3004>saying,<s%> you may be <S%G3903>prepared;<s%>

<S%G3381>lest<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> any <S%G3110>Macedonians<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> with me and <S%G2147>find<s%> you <S%G532>unprepared,<s%> we (not to <S%G3004>speak<s%> of you) should be <S%G2617>put<s%> to <S%G2617>shame<s%> by <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5287>confidence.<s%>

<S%G3767>So<s%> I <S%G2233>thought<s%> it <S%G316>necessary<s%> to <S%G3870>urge<s%> the <S%G80>brethren<s%> that they would <S%G4281>go<s%> on <S%G4281>ahead<s%> to you and <S%G4294>arrange<s%> <S%G4294>beforehand<s%> your <S%G4279>previously<s%> <S%G4279>promised<s%> <S%G2129>bountiful<s%> <S%G2129>gift,<s%> that the <S%G3778>same<s%> might be <S%G2092>ready<s%> as a <S%G2129>bountiful<s%> <S%G2129>gift,<s%> and not <S%G5613>affected<s%> by <S%G4124>covetousness.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> [I say,] he who <S%G4687>sows<s%> <S%G5340>sparingly<s%> shall <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2325>reap<s%> <S%G5340>sparingly;<s%> and he who <S%G4687>sows<s%> <S%G2129>bountifully<s%> shall <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2325>reap<s%> <S%G2129>bountifully.<s%>

Let <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1538>one<s%> [do] <S%G2531>just<s%> as he has <S%G4255>purposed<s%> in his <S%G2588>heart;<s%> not <S%G1537>grudgingly<s%> <S%G3077><s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1537>under<s%> <S%G318>compulsion;<s%> for <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G25>loves<s%> a <S%G2431>cheerful<s%> <S%G1395>giver.<s%>

And <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1414>able<s%> to <S%G4052>make<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G4052>abound<s%> to you, that <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G841>sufficiency<s%> in <S%G3956>everything,<s%> you may <S%G2192>have<s%> an <S%G4052>abundance<s%> for <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>deed;<s%>
as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> "He <S%G4650>scattered<s%> abroad, he <S%G1325>gave<s%> to the <S%G3993>poor,<s%> His <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G3306>abides<s%> <S%G165>forever.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> He who <S%G2023>supplies<s%> <S%G4690>seed<s%> to the <S%G4687>sower<s%> and <S%G740>bread<s%> for <S%G1035>food,<s%> will <S%G5524>supply<s%> and <S%G4129>multiply<s%> your <S%G4703>seed<s%> for sowing and <S%G837>increase<s%> the <S%G7032>harvest<s%> of your <S%G1343>righteousness;<s%>

you will be <S%G4148>enriched<s%> in <S%G3956>everything<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G572>liberality,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> us is <S%G2716>producing<s%> <S%G2169>thanksgiving<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For the <S%G1248>ministry<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3009>service<s%> is not <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G4322>fully<s%> <S%G4322>supplying<s%> the <S%G5303>needs<s%> of the <S%G40>saints,<s%> but is <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4052>overflowing<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2169>thanksgivings<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1223>Because<s%> of the <S%G1382>proof<s%> given by <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1248>ministry<s%> they will <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> for [your] <S%G5292>obedience<s%> to your <S%G3671>confession<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and for the <S%G572>liberality<s%> of your <S%G2842>contribution<s%> to them and to <S%G3956>all,<s%>

while they <S%G2532>also,<s%> by <S%G1162>prayer<s%> on your <S%G5228>behalf,<s%> <S%G1971>yearn<s%> for you <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G5235>surpassing<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in you.
